thread.title: Heather Watson knocked out of Hong Kong Open quarter-finals by Sam Stosur
thread.title_full: Heather Watson knocked out of Hong Kong Open quarter-finals by Sam Stosur

title: Heather Watson knocked out of Hong Kong Open quarter-finals by Sam Stosur
text:
Heather Watson knocked out of Hong Kong Open quarter-finals by Sam Stosur 16 Oct 2015 09:46:53 
comments 
Heather Watson lost the last 11 games as her run at the Hong Kong Open came to an end in the quarter-finals against Sam Stosur. 
Watson, now the British number two after Johanna Konta's rapid rise, made a fine start against former US Open champion Stosur and led by a set and 3-1. 
But from there things went rapidly downhill for Watson as Stosur clinched a 4-6 6-3 6-0 victory in just short of two hours. Related Sport News
